INSERT INTO USER_TABLE A ( A.USER_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_PHONE , A.USER_ADDRESS , A.USER_EMAIL , A.USER_NO , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.POINT , A.ROLE_CODE , A.BLACKLIST_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'N' , DEFAULT , 1 , 'N' )
SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_PHONE , A.USER_ADDRESS , A.USER_EMAIL , A.POINT FROM USER_TABLE A WHERE A.USER_CODE = ?
UPDATE USER_TABLE A SET A.USER_PWD = ? , A.USER_PHONE = ? , A.USER_ADDRESS = ? , A.USER_EMAIL = ? WHERE A.USER_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW A ( SATISFIED ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,ORDER_CODE ,STORE_CODE ,PICTURE_CODE ,REVIEW_CODE ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SEQ_REVIEW_CODE.NEXTVAL )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_BOARD A WHERE A.VISIBLE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USER_CODE = ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.BOARD_CODE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_CODE , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_DATE FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_CODE , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_CONTENT , C.BOARD_DATE FROM USER_BOARD C WHERE C.VISIBLE_YN = 'Y' AND USER_CODE=? ORDER BY C.BOARD_CODE DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO USER_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_CODE , A.BOARD_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.USER_CODE , A.VISIBLE_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_CODE.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' )
UPDATE USER_TABLE A SET POINT = A.POINT + 150 WHERE A.USER_CODE=?
SELECT A.ORDER_TIME ,A.TYPE_YN ,B.STORE_NAME ,A.ORDER_PROCEED ,A.OWNER_COMMENT ,A.ORDER_CODE ,A.STORE_CODE FROM ORDER_TABLE A , STORE_TABLE B WHERE A.STORE_CODE = B.STORE_CODE AND A.USER_CODE = ?
SELECT A.USER_ID FROM USER_table A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?

SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_DATE , C.REPLY_CONTENT , C.REPLY_DATE , D.USER_NAME FROM USER_TOTAL_REPLY_BOARD A JOIN USER_BOARD B ON (A.BOARD_CODE =B.BOARD_CODE) JOIN USER_REPLY C ON(A.REPLY_CODE = C.REPLY_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(B.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_CODE =?
